hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Space, space, wanna go to space, yes, please space. Space space. Go to space.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple MQ GS Freestanding Key Area

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Stick#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #the Minuet of Forest#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Song of Time#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say Ganon's tail is vulnerable to nuts, arrows, swords, explosives, hammers...^...sticks, seeds, boomerangs...^...rods, shovels, iron balls, angry bees...

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path of #hearts#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Stick#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##the Haunted Wasteland## has #1# major item.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #an Ocarina# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Stick Capacity#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #1# major item.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Raised Island Courtyard Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Treasure Box Shop#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Lobby Left Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Stick Capacity#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Song of Time#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Deku Nut Capacity#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path of #hearts#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: A broken stick is just as good as a Master Sword. Who knew?

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Red Rupee#.
